formElement.documentation: Previously defined configuration for the plugin
formElement.label: Configuration Name:

formElement.documentation: Folder path to upload. Can be either absolute or relative (will be calculated from the job workspace).
formElement.label: Source Folder:

formElement.documentation: Regular expression for file names to include into the upload, e.g. .*log, newline-separated.
formElement.label: Include Patterns:

formElement.documentation: Regular expression for file names to exclude from the upload, e.g. .*log, newline-separated.
formElement.label: Exclude Patterns:

formElement.documentation: Destination path in the target bucket, e.g. my/path. If the file in the folder named <folder>/path/file, and the path is my/folder, it will be placed at gs://<bucket>/my/folder/path/file.
formElement.label: Destination Object Path:

formElement.documentation: If checked, the objects will be made public. Not applicable to the buckets with uniform access.
formElement.label: Make Public?:

formElement.documentation: If checked, the existing object will be overwritten.
